sentences.en: A captain in the foreign legion is transferred to a desert outpost.
sentences.cn: 外国兵团中一位上尉被调守一座沙漠边塞.

sentences.en: a remote outpost of the empire
Abramovich appears weary of the speculation around why he chose the bleak outpost.
sentences.cn: 显然全世界对他为什么选择这个偏远村落的推测,让阿布感到有些厌烦.

sentences.en: After that you will go to Gibeah of God, where there is a Philistine outpost.
sentences.cn: 此后你到神的山, 在那里有非利士人的防兵.

sentences.en: At that time the most advanced outpost was still east of the Rockies.
sentences.cn: 那时,最前沿的哨所依然是落基山脉东麓.

sentences.en: Badaling Great Wall is an important juncture of the Pass outpost.
sentences.cn: 八达岭是万里长城重要关口居庸关的前哨.

sentences.en: Explanatory labels have been added to the Cost modifiers outpost interface to make it more intuitive.
sentences.cn: 哨站收服务税的界面增加了更多的解析,使其更直白.

sentences.en: He was assigned to a combat outpost, one of a number of smaller bases set up by foreign forces in Afghanistan, the officials said.
sentences.cn: 这名士兵被分配到一个战斗前哨，该哨所是驻阿富汗外国部队建起的较小的军事基地中的一个。

sentences.en: I've been putting down rebellions in this rotten outpost for eleven years.
sentences.cn: 十一年来我一直在偏僻边疆消弭叛变.

sentences.en: Mr. Wang said he had personally visited every Disney resort in the world, with the exception of the Shanghai outpost.
sentences.cn: 王健林说，他亲自逛过全世界的每一个迪士尼度假区，只有这家迪士尼在上海的前哨基地除外。

sentences.en: Photo Gallery: Alaska Snug outpost Harbor - population 298 - nestles beneath sheltering peaks.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加图片 画廊 .舒适的前哨,老港有298人口安置在高峰下面躲避.

sentences.en: Sold Outpost refunds only 30 % its cost instead of 50 %.
sentences.cn: 变卖前哨站将会只返还30%制造价格而不是50%.

sentences.en: Thailand was once an outpost of freedom in a fairly repressive region.
sentences.cn: 在周围地区相对保守封闭的环境中,泰国曾是自由的前哨.

sentences.en: The army and the people guard the island outpost together.
The Basic Refinery Upgrade now improves the outpost as intended.
sentences.cn: 基础精炼工厂升级现在正确地作用在哨站上了.

sentences.en: The troops received orders to trench the outpost.
sentences.cn: 部队接到命令在前哨周围筑壕加强防卫.

sentences.en: Their new outpost was on the crest of a hill.
sentences.cn: 他们新的前哨阵地设在一座小山包顶上.

sentences.en: Wastage is now applied to Outpost construction platform blueprints.
sentences.cn: 哨站建设研究蓝图应用时已计算损耗系数.

words.tran_cn: 前哨；警戒部队；边区村落

trans.tran_cn: 前哨，警戒部队，前哨基地，边区村落
trans.tran_en: a group of buildings in a place far from cities or towns, usually established as a military camp or a place for trade
